ns1:contractData.ns1:majorProgramCode: FEDERAL LIBRARY AND INFORMATION CENTER COMMITTEE
ns1:contractData.ns1:descriptionOfContractRequirement: Compusearch Virtual Acquisition Office (VAO) keeps acquisition professionals apprised of changes in legislation, policies, regulations, leading practices, protest and oversight reports, and their impact, via the daily Todays Acquisition News and the VAO series of proprietary publications. VAO provides the complete compilation of the latest OMB/OFPP Policies and Guidance, DOD/DPAP Policies and Guidance, GAO reports and protests, acquisition laws, and a wide range of current and historical acquisition content.

ns1:legislativeMandates.ns1:otherStatutoryAuthority: The Library of Congress Fiscal Operations Improvement Act, P.L. 106-481, Section (2 USC 182c)

ns1:contractData.ns1:descriptionOfContractRequirement: Library of Congress FEDLINK Books and Library Publications Acquisition Services
